19879856.description: EXTRA 25% OFF select regular and sale-priced clothing, shoes & accessories, & select home items with exclusions during our Wear Red Sale! EXTRA 25% OFF select regular and sale-priced clothing, shoes & accessories, & select home items with exclusions duri
19879856.legalDisclaimer: TO GET EXTRA SAVINGS: Place qualifying items in shopping bag, then enter promo code RED in the box labeled HAVE A PROMO CODE? and click APPLY. You can enter the promo code in your shopping bag at any time before or during checkout. Only one promo code may be used per transaction. EXTRA 25% OFF select regular and sale-priced clothing, shoes & accessories, & select home items, with exclusions listed. EXTRA 15% OFF select regular and sale-priced fine and fashion jewelry, sale & clearance-priced watches, with exclusions listed. EXTRA 10% OFF select regular, sale and clearance-priced electrics/electronics, sale and clearance-priced furniture, mattresses and rugs, with exclusions listed. 19869661.description: Save 20% on most remaining registry gifts!
19869661.legalDisclaimer: *With Macys Newlywed Discount Program, receive a 20% discount on gifts remaining on your registry, as well as any new items you choose to add (receive 10% on furniture, mattresses and rugs/floor coverings), for 180 days after your event, which can be redeemed in store or online at macys.com/registry. Newlywed Discount is valid for home product purchases only and may be used on regular price and sale items; exceptions apply. Newlywed Discount is not valid on Everyday Values (EDV), Breville, Dyson, KitchenAid Pro Line, Le Creuset Cookware, Shun, Tempur-Pedic, Tumi, Vitamix and Wüsthof or on Specials, Super Buys, or during 10% off sales in furniture, mattresses and rugs. This offer is not transferrable and cannot be combined with any savings pass/coupon offers. No Adjustments can be made on prior purchases or returned and repurchased merchandise. For more details, visit macys.com/newlyweddiscount.

19878273.description: Thank you for using your Macy's Card! You received an extra 10%!

attributeValue.attributeValue: Use your Macy's Card in checkout to receive an extra 10%!
